mapper.insert: select max(o_id) from t_order INSERT INTO t_order (user_id, order_table, store_name, discount_amount, pay_type, total_order_price) VALUES (#{userId}, #{orderTable}, #{storeName}, #{discountAmount}, #{payType}, #{totalOrderPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE o_id = #{id} order by o_id desc
SELECT * FROM t_order order by o_id desc
SELECT * FROM t_order where user_id=#{userId} order by o_id desc

select o.o_id, o.user_id, o.order_table, o.order_time, o.completed, d.d_id, d.order_id, d.product_id, d.quantity from t_order o join t_order_detail d on o.o_id = d.order_id where o.o_id=#{id} order by d.d_id desc

select o.o_id, o.order_table, o.order_time , d.quantity, d.dressing_id, d.added_stuff, d.added_quantity, p.name, p.price as unitprice, p.img, s.quantity as stamp, d.quantity*p.price as totalprice, o.discount_amount as discount, o.pay_type, o.store_name, o.total_order_price, o.completed from t_order o join t_order_detail d on o.o_id = d.order_id join t_product p on d.product_id =p.id join t_stamp s on o.o_id=s.order_id
where o_id=#{oid};

select o.o_id, o.user_id, o.order_time, d.quantity, p.name, p.english_name, p.type, d.added_stuff, d.added_quantity, d.dressing_id, d.quantity, p.price, p.img from t_order o join t_order_detail d on d.order_id=o.o_id join t_product p on d.product_id = p.id where user_id=#{id} order by o.o_id desc, d.d_id desc limit 5;

select o.o_id, o.user_id, o.order_time, d.quantity, p.name, p.type, p.price, p.img, o.store_name, o.completed from t_order o join t_order_detail d on d.order_id=o.o_id join t_product p on d.product_id = p.id where user_id=#{id} and order_time > date_add(now(), interval -1 month) order by o.o_id desc, d.d_id desc
